quote: We are all humiliated by the sudden discovery of a fact which has existed very comfortably and perhaps been staring at us in private while we have been making up our world entirely without it.
quote_letters: WE ARE ALL HUMILIATED BY THE SUDDEN DISCOVERY OF A FACT WHICH HAS EXISTED VERY COMFORTABLY AND PERHAPS BEEN STARING AT US IN PRIVATE WHILE WE HAVE BEEN MAKING UP OUR WORLD ENTIRELY WITHOUT IT
